alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:36PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Albany and southwestern Rensselaer Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 336 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Selkirk, or near Delmar, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... East Greenbush, Nassau, Castleton-On-Hudson, Selkirk, Totem Lodge, East Schodack, Brookview, Van Hoesen Station, South Albany, Selkirk Yards, Beckers Corners, Millers Corners, East Greenbush Station, Bethlehem Heights, South Schodack, Meyers Corners, Cedar Hill, Houcks Corners, Shivers Corners and Mallorys Corners. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 10. Interstate 87 between exits 21A and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
